about_the_game:
This game is in a pay-what-you-want model. The base game is free and we have this cheap DLC for those who would like to show appreciation and support. The package, when downloaded, can be found in the local game folder named `extra-package`. It includes original files of sprites, backgrounds, soundtracks, CG, and the logo.

Thank you for your support!
